item.title: BEL share price gains on defence sector order book updates: Do you own it?

review.headline_rewrite: BEL share price gains on defence sector order book updates: Do you own it?
bullets: Stock Market Today: BEL share price gained during the morning trades on Tuesday as the company reported defence sector order book updates on Monday,
As per the press release, BEL has received orders worth Rs.
The orders secured by Navratna Defence Public Sector Undertaking, Bharat Electronics Limited (BEL), as per the press release are additional orders worth Rs.
Majority of orders secured by BEL are in the Defence Sector though some are also for the Electronic voting machines etc.

item.title: NBFC stock under  ₹50 Paisalo Digital jumps over 5% after THIS announcement

review.headline_rewrite: NBFC stock under  ₹50 Paisalo Digital jumps over 5% after THIS announcement
bullets: For the quarter ending June 2025, Paisalo Digital posted a 13.25% year-on-year (YoY) growth in net profit at ₹47 crore, compared to ₹41.5 crore
Despite rising expenses, including higher finance costs and impairment charges, the company recorded a 13.9% YoY growth in profit before tax (PBT) at ₹63.60
Total expenses climbed to ₹155.11 crore from ₹130.75 crore in Q1FY25.

item.title: Indian Army contingent in US for Yudh Abhyas 2025

review.headline_rewrite: Indian Army contingent in US for Yudh Abhyas 2025
bullets: Attempting to isolate defence partnership from the tariff war, US and India have decided to continue with military exercises, even though there are indications
The Indian contingent, comprising personnel from a battalion of the Madras Regiment, will train alongside soldiers from the 1st Battalion, 5th Infantry Regiment “Bobcats”
In addition, subject-matter experts from both armies will conduct working groups on critical domains such as UAS and Counter-UAS operations, information warfare, communications and
